question: What is Alphafold?
ideal_answer: AlphaFold is a novel machine learning approach that incorporates physical and biological knowledge about protein structure, leveraging multi-sequence alignments, into the design of the deep learning algorithm.

snippets.text: Highly accurate protein structure prediction with AlphaFold.

AlphaFold is a novel machine learning approach that incorporates physical and biological knowledge about protein structure, leveraging multi-sequence alignments, into the design of the deep learning algorithm.
Using novel deep learning, AF2 predicted the structures of many difficult protein targets at or near experimental resolution.
Using the neural network-based method AlphaFold2, 3D structures of almost the entire human proteome have been predicted and made available (https://www.alphafold.ebi.ac.uk).

exact_answer: Highly accurate protein structure prediction approoach
